trends: There have been 69 other sightings in Boise
There was one other sighting in Boise on or around January 11th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWent out for a smoke and there they were the distance between them were exact traveling southeast from the nothern boise foothills made no sounds the color is what got my attention never seen these colors in the skies before not a jet airliner chopper star... very strange hope others report this as well
Summary: Multiple redish orange orbs very strong in color almost like setting sun
